title: Milnot Miracle Cheesecake
subtitle: A creamy no-bake cheesecake made with Milnot evaporated milk
description: Simple and nostalgic, this chilled dessert is a classic treat with a graham cracker crust.
instructions: Combine graham cracker crumbs and melted butter; press into bottom of 9x13 pan. Chill.
In a bowl, blend cream cheese, sugar, and lemon juice until smooth.
Whip chilled Milnot until stiff peaks form. Fold into cream cheese mixture.
Pour over crust and chill until firm. Top with cherry pie filling before serving.
